Title: Relates to railroad rolling stock
Summary: Exempts railroad rolling stock from sales and compensating use taxes; defines "railroad rolling stock" as a device, which is used exclusively upon stationary rails or tracks to transport goods, commodities, or equipment, including, but not limited to, flat cars, box cars, gondolas, hopper cars, or other freight railroad cars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting railroad rolling stock from sales and compensating use taxes
